title: Workshop for Strengthening Computer Science Curriculum Evaluation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Developing the ability to analyze equity and accessibility elements in curricula through rubric-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can identify equity and accessibility elements in the curriculum.
Learners can systematically evaluate computer science curricula using the TEC rubric.
Learners can propose curriculum improvement plans reflecting the cultural resources of students and the local community.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
